::Spears::

She woke up and saw Prebon standing there. She heard him ask her the 
qustion.  She tried as hard as she could to fight, but had to answer. 
She sat up, then stood, looking at Prebon. "The Maximal leader is 
Ramulus on the ARK."  She felt like she had betrayed her comrads.  
But the program was taking over her mind, slowly.  She would be a 
Trainer if she didn't get free of the chip soon.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> (I need Yanshosh to post before I can land the ship. I need you 
guys 
> to sit tight. Poor fool...lives on the west side and in a complete 
> different time zone. But when we get up he still sleep, so it evens 
> out.)
> 
> Vulois' image nods.
> 
> "There you go. You have your question. Peace. Now give me your 
> answer."
> 
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Prebon
> 
> 
> Prebon checked in on the prisoner. Still unconsious. He needed his 
> information now. He went to Spears.
> 
> "I have some questions to ask you. Specifically who are the main 
> leaders of the Maximals."
